column4: Greetings to all!)) help the novice user! A problem in the following, I can not unpack archive tar.gz in the necessary directory, all I do with the rights root that can be not so?? Explain how to make at once correctly is better!! In in advance thanks)
where are you trying to put it? and what are you doing?
ok, unpack it in your home folder, then move it across
alternatively use gksu nautilus and use that newly opened window to do it
